definition: to describe sth as/an analogy/a simile/a metaphor/an allegory

sentences.english: Sokurov, Death Concern, Cultural Metaphor, the Images of Mentalizing.
sentences.chinese: 索科洛夫，死亡關注，文化隱喻，心理化影像。

sentences.english: The snowdrift game is a celebrated game used as metaphor for investigating cooperative behaviors between selfish individuals.
sentences.chinese: 著名的雪堆博弈是自私個體間的合作行爲的一個隱喻。

sentences.english: One way of doing this is touse a metaphor elicitation technique.
sentences.chinese: 有一種方法是使用隱喻提取技術。

sentences.english: Utilizing a data-based research, this paper makes a contrastive study of metaphorical expressions in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本文運用語料調查的方法對比研究英漢隱喻運動表達。

sentences.english: Metaphoric competence is an important indication of the mastery of a language.
sentences.chinese: 隱喻能力是人們熟練掌握一種語言的重要標誌。

sentences.english: They are so conventionalized that speakers may not be conscious of their being metaphorical.
sentences.chinese: 他們是如此規約，發言可能不會意識到自己正在隱喻。

sentences.english: The simple hand-drawing animation is a metaphor of the social problem.
sentences.chinese: 簡單的手繪單線動畫，隱喻的卻是深刻的社會問題。

sentences.english: Metaphor is not only a figure of speech but a meta-mode of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 隱喻不僅是一種修辭手段，它也是人類思維的元方式。

sentences.english: A four-level analyzing model of metaphor has been presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，本文專門提出一種隱喻的四層次分析模型。

sentences.english: Metaphor and metonymy are treated as two different figures of speech in traditional rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的修辭理論把隱喻和換喻作爲兩個並列的修辭格。

sentences.english: The plain, direct writing, devoid of metaphor, suits the genre well.
sentences.chinese: 而平白直接的寫法，缺乏隱喻同樣適合這樣的風格。

sentences.english: The transference from any non-processed element to processed element gives birth to verbalized grammatical metaphor.
sentences.chinese: 任何非過程成分轉換成過程即可產生動詞化語法隱喻。

sentences.english: Spatialization metaphor is one of the chief means of cognition for mankind.
sentences.chinese: 空間隱喻是人類認知的一種重要手段。

sentences.english: Grammatical metaphor is one of important parts of Halliday's functional grammar.
sentences.chinese: 語法隱喻理論是韓禮德功能語法的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Metaphors as a form of reasoning by analogy involve categorization, entailment and inference.
sentences.chinese: 隱喻是一種形式的類比推理涉及分類，蘊涵和推理。

sentences.english: A considerable number of screen display or a metaphor for male and female copulate action.
sentences.chinese: 相當數量的畫面顯示或隱喻了男女交媾的動作。

definition: thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
